AdvAcctForecastAdjPeriod.name: AdvAcctForecastAdjPeriod
AdvAcctForecastAdjPeriod.description: Represents details about the adjustment period of the advanced account forecast values.

AdjustmentDayCount.description: The number of days during which forecast adjustments can be made.

AdvAccountForecastSetId.description: The forecast set associated with the advanced account forecast adjustment period.

Frequency.description: Indicates how frequently the adjustment windows will open.

ProfileId.description: The profile with which the forecast set can be adjusted.

StartDay.description: The day when forecast adjustments can begin.
